G

game - package game
Provided game package, containing all packages used to implement the game.
game.actions - package game.actions
Contains all action classes specialized for the game.
game.actions.speech - package game.actions.speech
Contains all speaking related classes specialized for the game.
game.actors - package game.actors
Contains all actor classes specialized for the game.
game.behaviours - package game.behaviours
Contains all behaviours (currently only used by enemies) for the game.
game.grounds - package game.grounds
Contains all ground classes for the game.
game.grounds.trees - package game.grounds.trees
Contains all tree classes (a subclass of the grounds) for the game.
game.items - package game.items
Contains all item classes required for the itemization in game.
game.reset - package game.reset
Contains all classes required to do the reset (Requirement 7)
game.utilities - package game.utilities
Contains all extra classes used only for utility to make the code cleaner.
